entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Baker Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:20 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -26.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Baker Lake Airport 7:53 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Blowing Snow
Temperature: -26.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -30.2°C
Wind: NNW 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Blizzard ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow at times late this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Monday 26 December 2022
